Name: Snoopy
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tangy fruit with a balancing hint of citrus and bitterness.
Nutrition: One serving of Snoopy contains 199 calories
